DOC.brief_summary: The aim study define optimal ovarian stimulation protocol concern PGD reason plan randomize controlled trial ( RCT ) compare gonadotropin-releasing hormone ( GnRH ) agonist protocol versus GnRH antagonist protocol . The follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) preparation arm highly purify FSH ( Menopur® ) .
DOC.brief_title: Preimplantation Genetic Diagnosis ( PGD ) With Gonadotropin-releasing Hormone ( GnRH ) Agonist Versus Antagonist
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize outpatient clinic two group .
DOC.criteria: ≤ 39 year day oocyte retrieval BMI ≤ 29 cycle rank 1 menstrual cycle 2536 day PGD preimplantation genetic screening ( PGS ) request ICSI Single embryo transfer ( SET ) day 5 Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) ( accord Rotterdam criterion ) Hormonal disturbance Endometriosis grade III IV
